SessionStart.command: echo '[MEMORY SYSTEM] Reading project state...' && cat .memory/state.md 2>/dev/null || echo 'No .memory/state.md found — run /memory-check to initialize.'

hooks.command: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path .git) { $status = git status --porcelain; if ($status) { echo '[GIT] Changes detected — will commit at task end.' } }"
